questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Road signs and safety
D) Art and culture

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At a beach
C) On a roadside
D) Inside a museum

What does the photo mainly focus on?
A) A tree
B) A road sign
C) A building
D) A person

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A car
C) A road sign
D) A building

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A playground
B) A beach
C) Trees and open field
D) A crowded street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bench
B) A road sign
C) A flower bed
D) A fountain

What does the sign in the photo say?  
A) "Stop"  
B) "Drive Slow, Children ahead"  
C) "Slow Children"  
D) "No Parking

What color is the road sign in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Green

What is depicted on the road sign?
A) A car
B) A running child
C) A bicycle
D) A pedestrian crossing

What is the purpose of the road sign?
A) To indicate a stop
B) To warn of children playing and to slow down the speed
C) To show a parking area
D) To direct traffic

What is the condition of the grass in the photo?
A) Dry and brown
B) Wet and muddy
C) Green and well-maintained
D) Covered in snow

What is the road condition in the photo?
A) Paved and smooth
B) Gravel and rough
C) Dirt and uneven
D) Cobblestone

What is the primary safety message of the sign?
A) Drive fast
B) Be cautious of children
C) No entry
D) Parking area

What is the shape of the road sign?
A) Circular
B) Triangular
C) Rectangular
D) Octagonal

What is the main color of the sky in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Gray
C) Orange
D) Pink

What is the primary activity the sign is warning about?
A) Parking
B) Construction
C) Slow down, Children playing
D) Wildlife crossing

What is the color of the curb in the photo?
A) White
B) Yellow
C) Red
D) Blue

How many trees are visible in the photo?
A) None
B) One
C) Two
D) Several

What type of sign is depicted in the photo?
A) Informational
B) Warning
C) Regulatory
D) Directional

What is the visibility of the sign in the photo?
A) Clear and unobstructed
B) Partially blocked
C) Completely obscured
D) Faded and hard to read

What is the main color of the sign's border?
A) Red
B) Black
C) Yellow and text in black
D) Blue

A) Wood
B) Plastic
C) Metal
D) Concrete

What is the orientation of the road sign?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Upside down

What is the state of the sky in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Overcast
C) Partly cloudy
D) Stormy

What is the primary color of the grass in the photo?
A) Brown
B) Green
C) Yellow
D) White

What is the primary action the sign is requesting from drivers?
A) Stop
B) Yield
C) Slow down, children might be running
D) Turn around

What is the general state of the environment in the photo?
A) Urban and busy
B) Quiet and open
C) Industrial and noisy
D) Crowded and congested

What is the road sign's primary function?
A) Informing
B) Warning
C) Directing
D) Regulating

How many words are on the road sign?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the primary visual element of the road sign?
A) Text
B) Image of a car
C) Image of a child running
D) Traffic light symbol

A) New and clear
B) Old and faded
C) Damaged
D) Missing

What is the primary action depicted on the road sign?
A) Stopping
B) Running
C) Walking
D) Driving

What is the primary message of the road sign?
A) No entry
B) Drive slowly, children might be running
C) Parking allowed
D) Pedestrian crossing

B) Trees and grass
C) Cars
D) People

What is the primary feature of the foreground in the photo?
A) A bench
B) A road sign
C) A tree
D) A bicycle

B) Contrast
C) Focus on the sign
D) Focus on the background

What is the primary color contrast in the photo?
A) Yellow and black
B) Red and white
C) Blue, green and yellow
D) Orange and purple

What is the primary safety instruction given by the road sign?
A) Speed up
B) Stop
C) Slow down
D) Turn left

What is depicted on the sign?
A) A car
B) Slow down, children might be running

D) A pedestrian

A) On a sidewalk

C) In a parking lot
D) On a beach

What is the purpose of the sign?
A) To warn drivers to slow down because children may be present

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Completely clear
